long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Bookmarker allows you to keep timestamps of your own  in a video and a note attached to that timestamp, this helps greatly when studying from youtube videos, especially when the video is of a longer duration and you need to take note or move to a certain point of the video, which otherwise is very difficult to find manually. This helps to navigate to certain important parts of the video with great ease, and increases productivity.

This extension is made for students and is comlpletely free to use, it is still under development and small bugs will be removed in the future upgraded versions
